name: Chaos.exe
description:
37th GM48 (Ranked 15/55) Theme: Falling Apart

This game was an entry for the 37th GM48. 

View original submission here: https://gm48.net/game/1784/chaosexe

The Jam Version of the game is the exact same as the one on the gm48 page.

Story

A short adventure/exploring game/experience inspired by classic .exe creepypasta games and Yume Nikki.

There are 2 endings

Content Warning

Those who know .exe games more or less know what's coming.
There aren't any loud jumpscares, but there are some sudden motions.
There may be effects that can interfere with sensitive peoples brains (epilepsy), but there aren't any flashing colors. 
There may also be some story themes that might be distressing to some people.

Controls WASD   Moving Space Jump E Interact FFullscreen1-9Change Windowsize Credits Programming WinuX Graphics SwissPick Audio WinuX & SwissPickLevel Design & Story SwissPick & WinuX
